data.subTitle: stringify定义toJSON
data.content:
'use strict';

var xiaoming = {
    name: '小明',
    age: 14,
    gender: true,
    height: 1.65,
    grade: null,
    'middle-school': '\"W3C\" Middle School',
    skills: ['JavaScript', 'Java', 'Python', 'Lisp'],
    toJSON: function() {
        return {//只输出name和age，并改变了key
            'Name': this.name,
            'Age': this.age
        };
    }
};
var s = JSON.stringify(xiaoming);
console.log(s)

输出结果：

{"Name":"小明","Age":14}
